flawed_nl_solution:
Kaiden collects 158 cans his first week and 259 cans during the second week. 158 + 259 = <<158+259=416>>416 cans of soup
Kaiden wants to collect a total of 500 cans, so he still needs 500 - 416 = <<500-416=84>>84 cans of soup

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 417, not 416. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
